articles.author: Kate Dennett
articles.title: Gogglebox star Ellie Warner's beau Nat Eddleston sports neck brace in first sighting since car crash - Daily Mail
articles.description: The plumber, 31, was said to be on life support after suffering collapsed lungs and a broken neck in a car crash, which happened in the Halton area of Leeds on March 19.
articles.content:
